data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kimsey, Lynn S., Copeland, Robert S. (2017): An unusual new species of Hedychridium Abeille from Africa. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 55: 103-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.55.12191, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.55.12191
